title: BRIEF-Transunion Announces Agreement To Acquire Callcredit
text:
April 20, 2018 / 10:53 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Transunion Announces Agreement To Acquire Callcredit Reuters Staff * TRANSUNION ANNOUNCES AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE CALLCREDIT 
* TRANSUNION - TRANSUNION AGREED TO ACQUIRE CALLCREDIT FOR £1 BILLION 
* TRANSUNION - DEAL FOR £1 BILLION 
* TRANSUNION - ACQUISITION IS ANTICIPATED TO CLOSE LATE IN Q2 OR EARLY IN Q3 
* TRANSUNION - TO ACQUIRE CALLCREDIT IN A DEAL WHICH IS VALUED AT ABOUT $1.4 BILLION AT TODAY’S EXCHANGE RATE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
